   19: %%
   20: 
   21: -module(t22_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -compile(export_all).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %% @spec suite() -> Info
   29: %% Info = [tuple()]
   30: %% @end
   31: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   32: suite() ->
   33:     [{require,file},
   34:      {require,tcname},
   35:      {timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   36: 
   37: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   38: %% @spec init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   39: %%     Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   40: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   41: %% Reason = term()
   42: %% @end
   43: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   44: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   45:     %% verify that expected config file can be read
   46:     case {ct:get_config(tcname),ct:get_config(file,undefined,[all])} of
   47: 	{start_separate,[cfg21]} -> ok;
   48: 	{start_join,[cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   49: 	{incl_separate1,[cfg12]} -> ok;
   50: 	{incl_separate1,[cfg21]} -> ok;
   51: 	{incl_separate2,[cfg12]} -> ok;
   52: 	{incl_separate2,[cfg21]} -> ok;
   53: 	{incl_join1,[cfg21,cfg11]} -> ok;
   54: 	{incl_join1,[cfg12,cfg11,cfg21]} -> ok;
   55: 	{incl_join2,[cfg21,cfg11,cfg12]} -> ok;
   56: 	{incl_both1,[cfg21]} -> ok;
   57: 	{incl_both1,[cfg12,cfg21]} -> ok;
   58: 	{incl_both2,[cfg11,cfg12,cfg21]} -> ok;
   59: 	{incl_both2,[cfg21]} -> ok;
   60: 	_ -> ok
   61:     end,
   62:     Config.
   63: 
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: %% @spec end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   66: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   67: %% @end
   68: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   69: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   70:     ok.
   71: 
   72: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   73: %% @spec init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   74: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   75: %% GroupName = atom()
   76: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   77: %% Reason = term()
   78: %% @end
   79: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   80: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   81:     Config.
   82: 
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: %% @spec end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
   85: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
   86: %% GroupName = atom()
   87: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   88: %% @end
   89: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   90: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   91:     ok.
   92: 
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: %% @spec init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
   95: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   96: %% TestCase = atom()
   97: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   98: %% Reason = term()
   99: %% @end
  100: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  101: init_per_testcase(autoskip_tc, Config) ->
  102:     exit(kaboom),
  103:     Config;
  104: 
  105: init_per_testcase(userskip_tc, Config) ->
  106:     {skip,"user skipped"};
  107: 
  108: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  109:     Config.
  110: 
  111: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %% @spec end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  113: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
  114: %% TestCase = atom()
  115: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  116: %% Reason = term()
  117: %% @end
  118: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  119: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  120:     ok.
  121: 
  122: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  123: %% @spec groups() -> [Group]
  124: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
  125: %% GroupName = atom()
  126: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
  127: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  128: %% TestCase = atom()
  129: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,{integer(),integer(),integer()}}
  130: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
  131: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
  132: %% N = integer() | forever
  133: %% @end
  134: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  135: groups() ->
  136:     [].
  137: 
  138: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  139: %% @spec all() -> GroupsAndTestCases | {skip,Reason}
  140: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
  141: %% GroupName = atom()
  142: %% TestCase = atom()
  143: %% Reason = term()
  144: %% @end
  145: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  146: all() -> 
  147:     [ok_tc, exit_tc, to_tc, autoskip_tc, userskip_tc].
  148: 
  149: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  150: %% @spec TestCase(Config0) ->
  151: %%               ok | exit() | {skip,Reason} | {comment,Comment} |
  152: %%               {save_config,Config1} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  153: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  154: %% Reason = term()
  155: %% Comment = term()
  156: %% @end
  157: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  158: ok_tc(_) ->
  159:     ok.
  160: 
  161: exit_tc(_) ->
  162:     exit(kaboom),
  163:     ok.
  164: 
  165: to_tc(_) ->
  166:     ct:timetrap(1),
  167:     ct:sleep(100),
  168:     ok.
  169: 
  170: autoskip_tc(_) ->
  171:     ok.
  172: 
  173: userskip_tc(_) ->
  174:     ok.
  175:     
  176: 
  177: 
  178:
